name: House Stealist
description:
NOTE- When you finish placing everything press the "ENTER" button to start the final cut scene.

Submission for Katana Jam II

Jam theme: "Wait, are we the bad guys?"

You are an expert in house interiors and antique stuff. You just moved into the new town. A town is full of big and rich mansions and, You already visited some. Citizens of this city do not afraid of spending a lot on furnishing their houses. Antique vases, Pictures from famous artists. Someday your own mansion will be even better than these.  

You just found a new mansion and. your objective is to decorate all the rooms by placing various objects in the right location.

You already know in what room which object is supposed to be.

Controls
WASD - Movement
Left Mouse Click - Grab Object
Right Mouse Hold - Rotate held object
"ENTER" button to start the final cut scene (we know that it's weird but we didn't had enough time to make some mechanics for that)
